## ProgramBuilder.atan2() method

Same as atan builtin function in GLSL and atan2 builtin function in WGSL

**Signature:**

```typescript
atan2(y: number | PBShaderExp, x: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  y | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  x | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
